alert.note: Alert for Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 8:22PM CDT until May 06 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montague County in north central Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 822 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bellevue, or near Bowie, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bowie, Nocona, St. Jo, Lake Nocona, Sunset, Lake Amon G Carter, Nocona Hills, Montague, Fruitland, Capps Corner, Forestburg, Ringgold, Spanish Fort, Stoneburg, Belcherville, Mallard, Bonita and Illinois Bend. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
